about_the_game:
A kingdom in ruin. A world in decay. Steel and skill are your only hope to unravel the secrets of this classic Metroidvania adventure

Description:
In this 2D sidescrolling action-adventure, explore a sprawling, interconnected world sliding into ruin, where every shadow hides danger and every path conceals a secret. Armed with steel and determination, you’ll battle relentless foes, uncover forgotten lore, and forge not only your own destiny, but the destiny of a kingdom gripped by chaos.

Master fast-paced 2D combat, uncover hidden paths, and test your skill in a classic Metroidvania adventure.  This journey will test your skill, wit, and resolve. Will you restore order, embrace the chaos, or forge a path all your own?

Features:

  • Dynamic Combat System: Master precise, fluid, and challenging combat to take on a diverse array of enemies, from corrupted knights to monstrous beasts. Dash, dodge, and strike with perfect timing to survive.

  • Diverse Arsenal: Wield swords, spears, whips, and more, each with unique moves and abilities.

  • Expansive, Interconnected World: A vast, hand-crafted realm filled with secrets, shortcuts, and hidden paths.

  • RPG Progression: Upgrade skills, equip powerful gear, and shape your playstyle.

  • Memorable Boss Fights: Test your mettle against powerful foes in 25+ epic boss encounters that require strategy, skill, and mastery of your abilities to defeat.

  • Unravel the Mystery: Uncover the truth behind the kingdom’s collapse.

Prepare for an unforgettable adventure where danger lurks in every shadow, and only the bold can uncover the truth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 | AMD Radeon HD 6670
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad recommended

short_description: Uncover a kingdom’s dark secrets in this 2D action-adventure Metroidvania. Explore a haunting world of ruins and shadow, master fluid, brutal combat, and unlock powerful abilities to overcome deadly enemies. Forge your path and choose your destiny in an ancient land balanced on the brink of ruin.
